items.sentence: Tom says he feels much better today than yesterday.
Tom said he had to be with his family on Christmas.
Tom said he planned to go to the meeting on Monday.
Tom said that he and Mary would be at home tonight.
Tom sat at the dining room table playing solitaire.
Tom satisfied his hunger by eating some sandwiches.
I thought Tom would give Mary John\'s phone number.
I want you to know that I can\'t be there tomorrow.
Tom asked Mary many questions about life in Boston.
Tom came on Monday and went back home the next day.
